targetLine.text: Marty, you have to wear the boots. You can't wear those futuristic things in 1885. You shouldn't even be wearing them in 1955.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: You haven't heard of him yet.

contextAfter.text: All right, Doc, look. Once I get there I'll put them on, I promise.
Okay, I think we're about ready. I put gas in the tank, your future clothes are packed, just in caseâ€”fresh batteries for your walkie-talkies. Oh, and what about that floating device?

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
